mapper.insert: insert into joinMember (name, userid, passwd, jumin, zipcode, addr1, addr2, email, phone) values (#{name}, #{userid}, #{passwd}, #{jumin}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select * from zipcode where DONG like #{dong}
select count(userid) cnt from joinMember where userid = #{userid}
select count(userid) cnt from joinMember where userid = #{userid} and passwd = #{passwd}
